data.text: The text to display on the link that opens the modal box.
data.class: The class for the aforementioned link.
data.size: Allows for the use of foundation size styles on the modal.
data.content: The HTML content that is to be displayed in the modal box.
data.closetext: The text that will be rendered as raw HTML within the modal's 'close button' element

events.toggleModal: Opens or closes the modal box, depending on the box's current visible state.
